meanings.definition: A form of motor-paced cycle racing in which track cyclists sprint for victory.
meanings.sent1: During the keirin, cyclists race around the track with motor-paced assistance.
meanings.sent2: The keirin event at the Olympics always draws a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: In the keirin race, the cyclists had to pedal faster than the motorbike!
meanings.sent4: Her determination in the keirin was like a speeding bullet on the track.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the keirin made the audience cheer loudly.
